careerBackground: I started my career working for a couple of start-ups in what is now Tech City/Silicon Roundabout. Since then much of my career has involved bringing start up culture, SME's and innovation into large projects and organisations. Outside of working at ANDigital, I work on a number of interesting voluntary and charity projects which focus on getting young, disadvantaged people into the tech industry.
superHeroPower: Have you ever seen that 80s Tom Hanks film 'BIG'? I'd love the ability to become a kid and then an adult again at the click of a finger. I guess it's the big kid in me!
